body: It seems a customized schedule produced by the **Honeybee_Create CSV Schedule** component is not acceptable by the **Honeybee_Add to EP library** component. May I ask how to add a customized schedule to the project library and call it for other use? Otherwise, we may need to manually connect the **csvSchedule** output node on the **Honeybee_Create CSV Schedule** component to other place requesting a schedule.  Thanks![](http://api.ning.com:80/files/-oaic7y9RVRar7dxRhKlvCgEuw7TyFuZUUYGvLnwwoflir1pbEXsFVWEYqBrGJOeZI8yZqjRz3HBIIntkyVLfSpGU0ENCiRA/09.JPG)
topic: how to save a customized schedule to the project library?

replies.body:
Hi Grasshope,

see the attached file for your schedule, this definition shows how I usually create an Energy Plus schedule.

Hope this helps.

thank you, Jacopo!



I see that in your example you're defining schedule in exactly the **IDF** format so that it can be added to the EP library.



However, I still want to know if there is a way to add a schedule customized in the "brute force" way of using the **Create CSV Schedule** component.



Advice is greatly appreciated!

Hi Grsshope, Since it's already saved as .csv file you can use the filepath itself. You don't need to add and call it. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/FzBIK0EevxAMrbw39rwmJ73H7B*xOgRJklU2Wxdcn9vanzPw8jr*uu8nRKSGUhJpWEl1--AJMevf79WZph6d2KsG8PnRRa8C/customSchedule.png) I hope this answers your question.

Thanks, Mostapha!



Wire connection sure is the direct and obvious way here.



I just wonder if customized schedule can be called by its name.



Thanks again!

We currently don't have a workflow for adding csv files to library but it can be added if we can find a solid workflow. The naming will be a challenge I would say but still possible. Added to github as a wish ([https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/issues/372](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/issues/372)). Thanks.
